00042 class DataSet;

00062 template <typename T, const unsigned int D>
00063 class DataSet {
00064 public:
00065   // Constructors and destructors;
00066   DataSet(); 
00067   DataSet(unsigned int size); 
00068   DataSet(Vector<T, D> *vectors, unsigned int size); 
00069   ~DataSet(); 
00070 
00071   // Copy constructor and assignment operator.
00072   DataSet(const DataSet& dataset); 
00073   DataSet& operator = (const DataSet& dataset); 
00074 
00075   // Initialization methods.
00076   void reset_to_size(unsigned int size); 
00077 
00078   // Attributes.
00079   unsigned int size() const { return size_; } 
00080   bool is_data_owner() const { return ptr_owner_; } 
00081 
00082   // Subscript operators.
00083   const Vector<T, D>& operator [] (unsigned int index) const { return vectors_[index]; } 
00084   Vector<T, D>& operator [] (unsigned int index) { return vectors_[index]; } 
00085 
00086   // Comparison operators.
00087   bool operator == (const DataSet& dataset) const; 
00088   bool operator != (const DataSet& dataset) const; 
00089 
00090   // Stream operators.
00091   friend std::istream & operator >> <>(std::istream &in, DataSet &set);
00092   friend std::ostream & operator << <>(std::ostream &out, const DataSet &set);
00093 
00094 private:
00095   Vector<T, D> *vectors_; 
00096   unsigned int size_; 
00097   bool ptr_owner_; 
00098 };
00099 
00100 } // namespace kche_tree
